summary: Provides TensorFlow implementations of multiple global pooling layers for graph neural networks, allowing aggregation of node embeddings into fixed‑size graph representations via mean, max, sum, attention, sorting, and learnable weighted‑sum mechanisms.
business_intent: Enable developers to construct graph‑level models in TensorFlow by offering ready‑to‑use pooling layers that convert variable‑size node feature sets into a single vector per graph for tasks such as graph classification, regression, or property prediction.
